entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
